What's New in Journal for macOS 1.1.2

üöÄ New Features

  • Added import/export functionality
    • Import .journal files from any folder on your Mac
    • Export all entries to a selected folder
    • Automatic duplicate handling during import
  • Redesigned Settings window with tabbed interface
    • General tab for storage and data management
    • About tab with app information and GitHub link
  • Added ability to view default storage location in Finder

üêõ Bug Fixes

  • Fixed entry editing behavior
    • Entries can now only be edited through swipe actions or detail view
    • Removed accidental editing when clicking entries
  • Fixed file permission issues with iCloud and external drives
  • Improved handling of storage directory access

üíÖ Improvements

  • Better feedback during import/export operations
  • Cleaner settings interface with grouped sections
  • More intuitive navigation between views
  • Enhanced file management system
